docs.snippet: Top government health officials said Sunday that they are opposed to placing a ban on travelers from Ebola-infected countries, warning that shutting down borders could impede efforts by aid workers to stop the spread of the deadly virus....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top government health officials said Sunday that they are opposed to placing a ban on travelers from Ebola-infected countries, warning that shutting down borders could impede efforts by aid workers to stop the spread of the deadly virus.

headline.main: Federal Officials Cast Doubt on Ebola Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Federal Officials Cast Doubt on Ebola Travel Ban

docs.snippet: American Jewish leaders have called off their travel boycott of Mexico, saying they are satisfied there has been "a decided reversal" of the attitude reflected by Mexico in voting last November in favor of a United Nations resolution linking Zioni...
docs.lead_paragraph: American Jewish leaders have called off their travel boycott of Mexico, saying they are satisfied there has been "a decided reversal" of the attitude reflected by Mexico in voting last November in favor of a United Nations resolution linking Zionism with racism.
docs.abstract: Conf of Presidents of Major Amer Jewish Orgns calls off its travel boycott of Mexico, saying it is satisfied there has been 'decided reversal' of attitude by Mexico since its Nov vote in UN for resolution equating Zionism with racism; conf, which represents 32 Jewish groups, says it has decided to recommend that relations between Amer Jewish groups and Mexico be 'fully normalized,' after reviewing developments since vote; notes it was reassured by recent statements by new Foreign Min Alfonso Garcia Robles; conf chmn Rabbi Alexander M Schindler comments (M)

headline.main: U.S. Jews End Ban on Travel to Mexico

docs.snippet: A French Muslim won a court order on Tuesday lifting a travel ban she says was imposed due to her ultra-conservative Salafist beliefs, in a case exposing tensions between France's official secularism and its Muslim minority....

headline.main: French Court Lifts Salafist Travel Ban Amid Tensions With Islam

docs.snippet: Sup Ct Justice Goldberg, writing decision striking down Internal Security Act's provision denying passports to members of Communist party and its fronts, holds Cong has power to protect natl security but it cannot condemn innocent activity along w...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sup Ct Justice Goldberg, writing decision striking down Internal Security Act's provision denying passports to members of Communist party and its fronts, holds Cong has power to protect natl security but it cannot condemn innocent activity along with evil; says Act is not specific enough with real dangers of Communist espionage and other criminal activity
